javadoc:
Property manager that deals with properties that are of
 a Saveable Object type and store within a database table.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Construct an Saveable object property map.

params.name: openMode
params.comment: the mode that the program was opened in.

params.name: monitor
params.comment: progress monitor that is only used when upgrading

throws.comment:
the map version is incompatible with
 the current Saveable object class version.  This will never be thrown
 if upgrade is true.
if the user cancels the upgrade operation.
if a database io error occurs.

methods.name: getSaveableClassForName
methods.comment:
Returns the class for the indicated class path name.
 If the class can't be determined,
 the GenericSaveable class is returned.

params.name: classPath
params.comment: the class path name of the desired class.

name: ObjectPropertyMapDB
comment:
Property manager that deals with properties that are of
 a Saveable Object type and store within a database table.
